gotta question regarding codeweavers cro: how do you get it to install on fiesty fawn?
so apt-get install gdesklets should install it?

that's how you can install any package.  1.) "sudo apt-cache search <string>" to find the package name, 2.) "sudo apt-get install <package-name>" to install it.  Synaptic is a GUI interface to the same APT backend that apt-get uses.  Some people find it easier.
